author: CMS-L1T-Jet-Tagging
body: #### PR description: This PR adds the new `l1tSC4NGJets` collection that was introduced in #47798 to the Phase 2 L1Nano output, such that it can be used in Phase 2 L1 menu studies. I've added the `typedef SimpleFlatTableProducer SimpleTriggerL1PFJetFlatTableProducer` and then used it for the new table in order to access the `getTagScore` method that was introduced in #47798 to `l1t::PFJet`. #### PR validation: This PR has been used to produce L1Nano ntuples and passed through the standalone menu tools to validate the PR and the object collection. Here's one example plot below, with more plots available [here](https://ssummers.web.cern.ch/CMS/TauJetsMET/V44NGJetDev/).
title: Add L1TSC4NGJets to Phase2L1TNanoAOD
